entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @lloydblankfein Perhaps President Trump is hoping that the spread of COVID-19 will kill enough people then unemployment rates will stay down and this will reflect a better image for him!   Sounds really crazy but no more crazy than ignoring the best protocols to stop the spread of COVID-19!
